A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lots of plot holes\, poor character writing\, lore breaking stunts all around\, no respect for Chekov's Gun\, needs to show and not tell\, and a chase scene that involves running out of fuel... in space... a vacuum where momentum doesn't slow down... I know Star Wars doesn't always follow IRL laws of physics\, but that one ruins the suspense of disbelief. Overall\, I don't recommend The Last Mary Sue.
